name: Watch My Back
description:
Adam and Mara are trapped on this island  after taking down the fearsome corporation that operated here. They are staying without bullets and have to cover ach other's backs...

CONTROLS

wasd or arrows to move

left click to shoot

r or right click to reload

end to reset

GAME JAM

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022 2 in 1 week

THEME

You are not alone

ASSETS

Sprites by Craftpix

Music by GameMaker
